title: Problems with Mac and League of Legends
body:
So I've been having a really big problem with my mac where, right as I load into the game, the screen automatically fixes itself at the fountain. I can move my characters and click on my abilities (if I try hard enough) but I can't move my screen anywhere on the map. It's just stuck at my fountain. The only way I can fix this bug is by disconnected, but by the time I reconnect, 2 minutes have passed and I'm already far behind in the game. 

I would like to know if anybody else is having this problem on their mac and what they did to get rid of it.

replies.body: It sounds like you might have a corrupt config, so it's failing to receive your inputs.  A[ config reset](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934-Mouse-and-Keyboard-Issues#mq2) should fix this up, but be sure to test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that helps.
